question:
Last Saturday, my sister Dina, did    something funny. She got up very late, at
six. She ran fast to the bathroom. She took
very quick bath, got dressed, took her bag,
and ran off to school. She did not even have
breakfast. After walking for five minutes,
she noticed that no other children were
going to school. Soon she realized it was
Saturday! So she walked back home. We
laughed at her when she got home. She also
laughed at herself.
8. Whatkind of the text is it?
a. Recount text
b. Descriptive text
c. Narrative text
d. Procedure text
9. The purpose of the text is ...?
a. Entertain the readers
b. Describe something
c. Tell past event
d. How to make something​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

8. A. recount text

9. C. tell past event

semoga terbantu, maap kalo salah. Kalo bener jangan lupa jadikan jawaban tercerdas yak✌

related_questions.question:
Dimas Do you have favorite novels?    Rino Thave two favorite novels. The llounted House
and The Secret Place
Dimas What kind of novel are they?
Rino The Hounted House is a horror novel, and
The Secret Place is a detective story
Dimas Which one is thicker?
Rino · The Haunted House has 50 pages, but the
Secret Place has 75 pages,
Dimas How much did you buy those novels?
Rino : The Haunted House is Rp. 35.000, and The
Secret Place is Rp. 125.000
Dimas: I like detective story, too. May I borrow yours
sometimes?
Rino Certainly! You may come to my house because
I have more interesting story books to read
26. Who likes detective story?
A Dimas.
C None
B. Rino
D. Dimas and Rino​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Dimas

Penjelasan:

karena di situ Dimas bilang "i like detective story'"

maaf kalau salah ya, semangat belajar nya

related_questions.question: Darwin is 60 years old.poltak is about 50 years old it's mean​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

It's mean: darwin is older than poltak

Jawaban:

  • Darwin is older than Poltak.
  • Poltak is younger than Darwin.

Penjelasan:

Degrees of Comparison merupakan salah satu grammar dalam bahasa Inggris. Degrees of Comparison masuk ke dalam kategori Adjective dan Adverbial. Fungsinya untuk membandingkan kualitas sifat (adjective) atau kualitas pekerjaan (adverb) dari dua pelaku atau lebih.

Comparative Degree merupakan suatu nama yang diberikan untuk grammar untuk membandingkan dua orang, binatang, benda, ataupun hal.

Rumus:

  • S + to be + adjective + er  + than + S
  • S + to be + more + adjective + than  + S

Semoga membantu ^.^

related_questions.question:
24. Della : "James, I need one hundred more bed    shield and pillow cases of any color. Can
you deliver them this week?”
James : "Sure but the price is increasing about
10%. Will you still make an order?”
Della : "If that's so, I have to tell this to my
boss. I'll give you a call after lunch."
What is the woman going to do?
A. Talk to her boss.
B. Cancel the order.
C. Buy the pillow.
D. Ask for a discount.
E. Look for another supplier.​
